releaseLicense(productCode:String, version:String, serveronly:Boolean) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method releases a license so that others can use it It dispatches a LicenseClientEvent of type LicenseClientEvent.LICENSE_RESPONSE with a req_type of NLMConstants.REQUEST_RELEASELICENSE.
renewLicense(productCode:String, version:String, days:int) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method renews a LOCK_FIXED (checkout) license for an additional number of days.
req_type — Property, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClientEvent
The original request type that generated this response event
